product_url.title: Product Url
product_url.description: Product URL for automatic extraction (Flow A)

title.title: Title
title.description: Product title for manual input (Flow B)

image_urls.title: Image Urls
image_urls.description: Image URLs (Flow B or supplement to Flow A)

image_base64s.title: Image Base64S
image_base64s.description: Base64 encoded product images (Flow B file upload)

reference_url.title: Reference Url
reference_url.description: Reference product URL for style extraction

schema.title: FullPipelineRequest
schema.description:
Request payload for /api/style-transfer/full-pipeline endpoint.

Supports two modes:
- Flow A (URL mode): Provide product_url for automatic extraction
- Flow B (Manual mode): Provide title + description + images directly

The endpoint will:
1. Extract/accept product data
2. Run style analysis (100-agent swarm)
3. Generate styled images
4. Return thread_id for polling
